welcome

Hey folks, I'm Mike! I'm a developer based near Atlanta, GA. I design, build, and deploy web apps and websites.

In fact, not only did I build this website, I built it the hard way: no templates, no WYSIWYG editors, no boilerplate, no shortcuts.

Why? Because that's how I learned...
